thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: You May Be Eligible For a Cash Award—No, Really, Wait, Don’t Hang Up

author: Sara Randazzo
title: You May Be Eligible For a Cash Award—No, Really, Wait, Don’t Hang Up
text:
West Virginia attorney John Barrett really wants his clients to know he won a $61 million verdict against Dish Network Corp. on their behalf after a company contractor badgered people with marketing phone calls.
There is just one hitch: His clients keep hanging up when he calls to convey the good news.
One woman said “that’s ridiculous”...
